    addAdmin(Admin) - Static method in class persistence.AdminRepository
    Adds a new admin to the repository.
    addBook(Book) - Method in class application.BookService
    Adds a new book to the repository after validating its required fields.

    Adds a new book to the repository.

    Add a new CD to the repository.
    addLoan(Loan) - Method in class application.LoanService
    Saves a loan in the repository.
    addMember(Member) - Static method in class persistence.MemberRepository
    Adds a new member to the repository if not already present.
    addMemberFine(double) - Method in class domain.Member
    Adds a fine amount to the member's account.
    Admin - Class in domain
    Represents an administrator user in the library system.
    Admin() - Constructor for class domain.Admin
    Default constructor that creates an empty Admin object.
    Admin(String, String) - Constructor for class domain.Admin
    Constructs a new Admin with the specified credentials.
    Admin(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class domain.Admin
    Constructs a new Admin with full profile information.
    AdminActions - Class in application
    Application-level fa√ßade for administrator operations.
    AdminActions() - Constructor for class application.AdminActions
    Creates an instance with default repositories wired into services.
    AdminActions(MemberService, LoanService) - Constructor for class application.AdminActions
    Creates an instance with explicit services (no email service).
    AdminActions(MemberService, LoanService, EmailService) - Constructor for class application.AdminActions
    Creates an instance with explicit services and optional email service.
    AdminFileLoader - Class in application
    Loads administrator data from an external file into Admin objects.
    AdminFileLoader(String) - Constructor for class application.AdminFileLoader
    Creates a new loader that reads admin records from a classpath resource.
    adminManageUsersMenu() - Method in class presentation.MenuController
    Displays and handles the admin user management menu.
    adminRegister(Admin) - Method in class application.AdminService
    Registers a new administrator in the system.
    AdminRepository - Class in persistence
    Repository for managing admin-related persistence operations.
    AdminRepository() - Constructor for class persistence.AdminRepository
    Creates a new AdminRepository instance with default configuration.
    AdminService - Class in application
    Provides services and business logic related to administrators in the library system.
    AdminService() - Constructor for class application.AdminService
    Default constructor.
    AdminService(AdminRepository) - Constructor for class application.AdminService
    Constructs an AdminService with a provided repository.
    AdminSourceLoader - Interface in application
    Represents a source loader for administrators.
